description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Warlock is a Freescale Action RPG in a randomly generated world and 18 unique spells. Created by John Snowdon; a post graduate student producing his first game.  Freescale: The player can continue to play and develop their character indefinitely without maximum stat or strength limits imposed by the developer.
